price: Yūsuf, ṣẹ́rí kúrò níbi èyí. Kí ìwọ (obìnrin yìí) sì tọrọ àforíjìn fún ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ rẹ. Dájúdájú ìwọ wà lára àwọn aláṣìṣe.”
arabic: يُوسُفُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَٰذَاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِي لِذَنۢبِكِۖ إِنَّكِ كُنتِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَاطِـِٔينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yūsufu aʿriḍ ʿan hādhā wa-is'taghfirī lidhanbiki innaki kunti mina al-khāṭiīna
